import React from 'react' import './BasketButton.sass' import {FontAwesomeIcon} from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import {faHryvnia} from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons" import {faShoppingBasket} from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import {useSelector} from 'react-redux' function BasketButton() { const {totalPrice, totalCount} = useSelector( ({cart}) => cart) return (
{totalPrice}
{totalCount}
) } export default BasketButton
